headline: Battlefield 6 - the Ultimate All-Out Warfare Experience Launches Today
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., October 10, 2025--Electronic Arts Inc. and Battlefield Studios have launched Battlefield 6™, the ultimate all-out warfare experience.

raw.headline: Battlefield 6 - the Ultimate All-Out Warfare Experience Launches Today
raw.summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., October 10, 2025--Electronic Arts Inc. and Battlefield Studios have launched Battlefield 6™, the ultimate all-out warfare experience.

headline: Electronic Arts Acquisition Is 2nd-Largest Video Game Deal On Record
summary: An investor group's $56.78 billion deal to take Electronic Arts Inc. private would be the second-largest deal on record for the video game industry.

raw.headline: Electronic Arts Acquisition Is 2nd-Largest Video Game Deal On Record
raw.summary: An investor group's $56.78 billion deal to take Electronic Arts Inc. private would be the second-largest deal on record for the video game industry.
